aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: Party Games Collection is your premier online destination for free, interactive party games. We offer a diverse collection of engaging social games including Find the Spy, Never Have I Ever, and more - perfect for virtual gatherings, parties, and team building events. Join thousands of players worldwide for unforgettable gaming experiences!

feedback.pageTitle: Feedback - Share Your Thoughts | Party Games Collection

theList.pageTitle: 10 Fun Drinking Games Without Cards for Couples | Party Games Guide
theList.mainTitle: 10 Fun Drinking Games Without Cards for Couples and Pairs 🎲

game1.title: 🤔 1. Never Have I Ever (Perfect for Couples)
game1.description: Take turns saying something you've never done. If your partner has done it, they drink! A classic drinking game for couples that sparks fun conversations and reveals hidden stories.

game2.title: 🎯 2. Truth or Dare (Two-Player Edition)
game2.description: Choose "truth" (answer a personal question) or "dare" (complete a challenge). Refusing means taking a drink. One of the best two-player drinking games for couples who want to spice things up.

game3.title: 🔢 3. 21 (Quick and Simple)
game3.description: Count up from 1, saying 1 to 3 numbers per turn. The player who says "21" drinks. A fast-paced drinking game without cards that's perfect for pairs.

game4.title: 🧠 4. Word Association (Brainy Fun)
game4.description: One person says a word, and the other quickly responds with a related word. Hesitate or repeat, and you drink! A fun two-player drinking game that tests your creativity and reflexes.

game5.title: 📖 5. Story Time (For Creative Couples)
game5.description: Start a story with one sentence, and take turns adding to it. Can't think of a line? Take a drink! A hilarious couples drinking game that lets your imagination run wild.

game6.title: 🎵 6. Number Guessing (Simple and Fun)
game6.description: One person thinks of a number (e.g., 1-100). The other guesses, and wrong guesses mean drinking. An easy drinking game without cards for couples or pairs.

game7.title: 🎬 7. Finger Game (Fast-Paced Fun)
game7.description: Both players hold up 1-5 fingers. One calls a number, and if the total matches, they drink. A quick two-player drinking game that's perfect for keeping the energy high.

game8.title: 🎲 8. Rapid Fire Questions (Test Your Knowledge)
game8.description: One person fires quick questions at the other. Hesitation or wrong answers mean drinking. A fun drinking game for couples that's both competitive and entertaining.

game9.title: ❓ 9. Copycat (Laugh-Out-Loud Fun)
game9.description: One person does an action or makes a face, and the other copies it and adds a new one. Fail, and you drink! A hilarious couples drinking game that's sure to bring out the laughs.

game10.title: 🎮 10. Video Game Challenge (For Gamer Couples)
game10.description: Play a competitive video game. Loser takes a drink after each round. A modern twist on drinking games that's perfect for gamer couples looking for some friendly competition.

theList.safetyTip1: 🚫 Know Your Limits: Always drink responsibly and know when to stop.
theList.safetyTip2: 🚗 No Driving: Never drive after playing drinking games. Plan for a safe ride home.
theList.safetyTip3: 💧 Stay Hydrated: Alternate alcoholic drinks with water to stay hydrated.
theList.safetyTip4: 🍽️ Eat Before Playing: Never drink on an empty stomach.
theList.safetyTip5: 👫 Look Out For Each Other: Always play with people you trust who will help keep you safe.
